meanings.definition: A person or group of people who build boats.
meanings.sent1: The boatbuilders worked together to construct a new fishing boat.
meanings.sent2: Many boatbuilders gathered at the dock to showcase their latest creations.
meanings.sent3: The boatbuilders joked that they could build a boat blindfolded.
meanings.sent4: Their teamwork was like a symphony, each boatbuilder playing a crucial role.
meanings.sent5: The boatbuilders' dedication to their craft was evident in every detail of the ship.

meanings.definition: The act or process of building boats.
meanings.sent1: Watching the boatbuilders at work was fascinating.
meanings.sent2: The boatbuilders' expertise was evident in the sturdy vessels they created.
meanings.sent3: The boatbuilders' workshop was a hive of activity, with tools clanging and wood shavings flying.
meanings.sent4: The boatbuilders' craft was like magic, turning raw materials into seaworthy vessels.
meanings.sent5: The boatbuilders' passion for their work shone through in every boat they built.
